# RetroAuto v2 Documentation for LLMs

> **Project:** RetroAuto v2 (Windows Automation IDE)
> **Description:** A Python-based automation tool featuring a visual IDE, custom DSL (RetroScript), and 'Human Mouse' anti-ban technology.

## ðŸ“š Core Documentation (Reading Order)

1. **[The Launchpad](user_guide/launchpad.md)** - Getting Started, Installation, UI Tour.
2. **[The Cookbook](user_guide/cookbook.md)** - Practical Recipes (Auto-Login, Farming).
3. **[Core Concepts](user_guide/core_concepts.md)** - Execution Model (Sync/Async), Coordinates, Matching.
4. **[Tools Mastery](user_guide/tools_mastery.md)** - Detailed GUI & IDE Manual.
5. **[Deep Dive](user_guide/deep_dive.md)** - Advanced Tech (OCR, Anti-Ban, Interrupts).
6. **[Reference Manual](user_guide/reference_manual.md)** - Full API Dictionary (100% Commands).
7. **[Troubleshooting](user_guide/troubleshooting.md)** - Error Diagnosis.

## ðŸ§  Key Context for Code Generation

- **Language:** Python 3.11+ (Backend), PySide6 (UI).
- **DSL:** RetroScript (Python-like indentation).
- **Anti-Ban:** Use `click_random` and `delay_random` instead of fixed values.
- **Vision:** OpenCV Template Matching (Grayscale default).
- **OCR:** Tesseract Integration.

## ðŸ”— Full Context File
For a single-file context dump, see: **[Full User Guide](full_user_guide.md)**
